dialogText: Greetings. $I’m certainly surprised to see people brave enough to wander around out here. $I’m Officer Beni.$...$Come to think of it, I’m surprised to see you at all. $You’re not from here are you?$Well, I suppose you'll have a few questions for me.
So, what would you like to know?

choices.text: What did you mean by brave?

dialogText: Heh, either brave or stupid.. $There have been a series of unexplained deaths happening around here lately.$Even though all evidence points to the events being accidents, most people choose to stay inside.$So, any other questions?
We’re in the Slumberwood, just outside Torpidale.$Any other questions?
I’m standing guard by the path here to make sure nobody wanders too far... $Wouldn’t want anyone else to get hurt.$Any other questions?
Well It’s a miracle I got out here safely myself... Though, I was just about to head home. $How about I, uh, escort you both back to town?
